bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of a blockage of narrow sections of narrow structures such as the throat because of a swelling. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu sha gen 硃砂根：咽喉腫痹，磨水或醋嚥 之，甚良 , “For swelling with blockage affecting the throat swallow [this substance] ground in water or vinegar. Very good”.
② Pathological Condition of a bi 痹①
a) , blockage disease, with obvious swelling. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 8 ：莽草 膏，療諸賊風腫痹 , “Ointment with mang cao cures all types of robber wind and swelling with blockage ”.
